languages.text: "Мой облик — наследие многих поколений людей, которые провели всю жизнь в глубинах корабля. Большинство из нас и наших предков никогда не покидало свой родной дом. Впрочем, подобное можно сказать о жителях миллионов миров Империума. Мы привыкли к тишине космоса и голосам корабля. Нас тысячи, но мы живем далеко от верхних палуб Лорд-капитана, потому почти незаметны. Мы — пустотнорожденные".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мастер Вокса на секунду задумывается.{/n} "Большинство из нас и наших предков никогда не сходили с родного корабля. Впрочем, подобное можно сказать о жителях многих миров Империума. Мы — привыкшие к тишине космоса. Мы — привыкшие к голосам корабля. Нас тысячи, но мы живем далеко от верхних палуб Лорда-капитана, потому почти незаметны. Мы — пустотники".

languages.text: "My appearance comes from my heritage, generation after generation of people who spent their entire lives in the depths of this voidship. Neither we nor our ancestors have ever left our home, but the same can be said about many denizens of the Imperium's million worlds. We are used to the silence of the cosmos and the voices of the ship. There are thousands of us, but we dwell far from the Lord Captain's upper decks and remain unseen. We are the voidborn."
languages.original_text: "Мой облик — наследие многих поколений людей, которые провели всю жизнь в глубинах корабля. Большинство из нас и наших предков никогда не покидало свой родной дом. Впрочем, подобное можно сказать о жителях миллионов миров Империума. Мы привыкли к тишине космоса и голосам корабля. Нас тысячи, но мы живем далеко от верхних палуб Лорд-капитана, потому почти незаметны. Мы — пустотнорожденные".

traits.locale_text: "My appearance comes from my heritage, the line of many generations of people who spent their entire lives deep in this vessel's hold. Neither we nor our ancestors ever left our home, but the same can be said about many denizens of the Imperium's million worlds. We are used to the silence of the cosmos and the voices of the vessel. There are thousands of us, but we dwell far from Lord Captain's upper decks and remain unseen. We are the Voidborn."

"My appearance comes from my heritage, generation after generation of people who spent their entire lives deep in the depths of this voidship. Neither we nor our ancestors have ever left our home, but the same can be said about many denizens of the Imperium's million worlds. We are used to the silence of the cosmos and the voices of the ship. There are thousands of us, but we dwell far from the Lord Captain's upper decks and remain unseen. We are the voidborn."

We are used to the silence of the cosmos and the voices of the ship. There are thousands of us, but we dwell far from the Lord Captain's upper decks and remain unseen. We are the voidborn."

Neither we nor our ancestors have ever left our home, but the same can be said about many denizens of the Imperium's million worlds. We are used to the silence of the cosmos and the voices of the ship. There are thousands of us, but we dwell far from the Lord Captain's upper decks and remain unseen. We are the voidborn."

languages.text: «Mi aspecto es fruto de mi linaje: generación tras generación de gente que pasó sus vidas enteras en las entrañas de esta nave del vacío. Ni nuestros antepasados ni nosotros hemos dejado nunca nuestro hogar, pero lo mismo puede decirse de la mayoría de los habitantes del millón de mundos que componen el Imperium. Estamos acostumbrados al silencio del cosmos y a las voces de la nave. Somos millares, pero vivimos lejos de las cubiertas superiores de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} y permanecemos invisibles. Somos los nacidos en el vacío».
languages.original_text: "My appearance comes from my heritage, generation after generation of people who spent their entire lives in the depths of this voidship. Neither we nor our ancestors have ever left our home, but the same can be said about many denizens of the Imperium's million worlds. We are used to the silence of the cosmos and the voices of the ship. There are thousands of us, but we dwell far from the Lord Captain's upper decks and remain unseen. We are the voidborn."

traits.locale_text: «Mi aspecto es fruto de mi linaje: generación tras generación de gente que pasó sus vidas enteras en las entrañas de esta nave del vacío. Ni nuestros antepasados ni nosotros hemos dejado nunca nuestro hogar, pero lo mismo puede decirse de la mayoría de los habitantes del millón de mundos que componen el Imperium. Estamos acostumbrados al silencio del cosmos y a las voces de la nave. Somos millares, pero vivimos lejos de las cubiertas superiores de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} y permanecemos invisibles. Somos los nacidos en el vacío».

languages.text: “我的外表源自我的血脉，源自一代又一代在这艘虚空舰上度过一生的祖辈们。我们与我们的祖先从来没有离开过的家园，不过，帝国百万世界中的无数居民也同样如此。我们已经习惯了寂静的宇宙与飞船的轰鸣。像我们这样的人有成千上万，但我们居住在离领主舰长上层甲板很远的地方，不为他人所知。我们便是虚空之子。”
languages.original_text: "My appearance comes from my heritage, generation after generation of people who spent their entire lives in the depths of this voidship. Neither we nor our ancestors have ever left our home, but the same can be said about many denizens of the Imperium's million worlds. We are used to the silence of the cosmos and the voices of the ship. There are thousands of us, but we dwell far from the Lord Captain's upper decks and remain unseen. We are the voidborn."

traits.locale_text: “我的外表源自我的血脉，源自一代又一代在这艘虚空舰上度过一生的祖辈们。我们与我们的祖先从来没有离开过的家园，不过，帝国百万世界中的无数居民也同样如此。我们已经习惯了寂静的宇宙与飞船的轰鸣。像我们这样的人有成千上万，但我们居住在离领主舰长上层甲板很远的地方，不为他人所知。我们便是虚空之子。”

languages.text: 「この姿は受け継いだものであり、このヴォイドシップの奥底で先祖代々一生を過ごしたご先祖様からいただいたのです。私達も父祖も外に出たことはありませんが、それは帝国の100万もの惑星の多くの民も同じです。宇宙の静けさと船の声には慣れています。このような民は何千人もいますが、ロード・キャプテンの上層デッキからは遠く離れて住んでおり、お目にはかかれません。虚空生まれという者達です」
languages.original_text: "My appearance comes from my heritage, generation after generation of people who spent their entire lives in the depths of this voidship. Neither we nor our ancestors have ever left our home, but the same can be said about many denizens of the Imperium's million worlds. We are used to the silence of the cosmos and the voices of the ship. There are thousands of us, but we dwell far from the Lord Captain's upper decks and remain unseen. We are the voidborn."

traits.locale_text: 「この姿は受け継いだものであり、このヴォイドシップの奥底で先祖代々一生を過ごしたご先祖様からいただいたのです。私達も父祖も外に出たことはありませんが、それは帝国の100万もの惑星の多くの民も同じです。宇宙の静けさと船の声には慣れています。このような民は何千人もいますが、ロード・キャプテンの上層デッキからは遠く離れて住んでおり、お目にはかかれません。虚空生まれという者達です」

languages.text: "Mein Aussehen rührt von meiner Abstammung her, Generation um Generation haben wir unser ganzes Leben in den Tiefen dieses Raumschiffs verbracht. Weder wir noch unsere Vorfahren haben unser Zuhause jemals verlassen, aber das gilt für viele Einwohner der Million Welten des Imperiums. Wir sind an die Stille des Kosmos und die Stimmen des Schiffs gewöhnt. Es gibt Tausende von uns, aber wir leben weitab der oberen Decks des Lord Captain und bleiben ungesehen. Wir sind die Kinder der Leere."
languages.original_text: "My appearance comes from my heritage, generation after generation of people who spent their entire lives in the depths of this voidship. Neither we nor our ancestors have ever left our home, but the same can be said about many denizens of the Imperium's million worlds. We are used to the silence of the cosmos and the voices of the ship. There are thousands of us, but we dwell far from the Lord Captain's upper decks and remain unseen. We are the voidborn."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Aussehen rührt von meiner Abstammung her, Generation um Generation haben wir unser ganzes Leben in den Tiefen dieses Raumschiffs verbracht. Weder wir noch unsere Vorfahren haben unser Zuhause jemals verlassen, aber das gilt für viele Einwohner der Million Welten des Imperiums. Wir sind an die Stille des Kosmos und die Stimmen des Schiffs gewöhnt. Es gibt Tausende von uns, aber wir leben weitab der oberen Decks des Lord Captain und bleiben ungesehen. Wir sind die Kinder der Leere."

languages.text: « Mon apparence est due à mon héritage, plusieurs générations d'individus qui ont passé leur vie entière à bord de ce vaisseau. Ni nous ni nos ancêtres n'avons jamais quitté notre foyer, mais il en va de même pour un grand nombre des citoyens qui peuplent les millions de mondes de l'Imperium. Nous sommes habitués au silence du cosmos et aux voix du vaisseau. On nous compte par milliers, mais nous vivons loin des ponts supérieurs où siège {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et restons hors de vue. Nous sommes des hors-monde. »
languages.original_text: "My appearance comes from my heritage, generation after generation of people who spent their entire lives in the depths of this voidship. Neither we nor our ancestors have ever left our home, but the same can be said about many denizens of the Imperium's million worlds. We are used to the silence of the cosmos and the voices of the ship. There are thousands of us, but we dwell far from the Lord Captain's upper decks and remain unseen. We are the voidborn."

traits.locale_text: « Mon apparence est due à mon héritage, plusieurs générations d'individus qui ont passé leur vie entière à bord de ce vaisseau. Ni nous ni nos ancêtres n'avons jamais quitté notre foyer, mais il en va de même pour un grand nombre des citoyens qui peuplent les millions de mondes de l'Imperium. Nous sommes habitués au silence du cosmos et aux voix du vaisseau. On nous compte par milliers, mais nous vivons loin des ponts supérieurs où siège {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et restons hors de vue. Nous sommes des hors-monde. »

languages.text: "Görünüşüm; devraldığım mirastan, nesiller boyunca tüm ömürlerini bu uçsuz gemisinin derinliklerinde geçirmiş olan insanlardan geliyor. Ne bizim ne de atalarımızın evimizden çıkmışlığımız var. Gerçi aynı şey İmparatorluk'un milyonlarca dünyasının sayısız sakini için de geçerli. Kainatın sükûnetine ve geminin seslerine aşina olduk. Bizler gibi binlercesi var lakin gözlerden ve Lord Kaptan'ın üst güvertelerinden uzakta yaşıyoruz. Bizler uçsuzdoğanlarız."
languages.original_text: "My appearance comes from my heritage, generation after generation of people who spent their entire lives in the depths of this voidship. Neither we nor our ancestors have ever left our home, but the same can be said about many denizens of the Imperium's million worlds. We are used to the silence of the cosmos and the voices of the ship. There are thousands of us, but we dwell far from the Lord Captain's upper decks and remain unseen. We are the voidborn."

traits.locale_text: "Görünüşüm devraldığım mirastan, nesiller boyunca tüm ömürlerini bu uçsuz gemisinin derinliklerinde geçirmiş olan insanlardan geliyor. Ne bizim ne de atalarımızın evimizden çıkmışlığımız var. Gerçi aynı şey İmparatorluk'un milyonlarca dünyasının sayısız sakini için de geçerli. Kainatın sükûnetine ve geminin seslerine aşina olduk. Bizler gibi binlercesi var lakin gözlerden ve Lord Kaptan'ın üst güvertelerinden uzakta yaşıyoruz. Bizler uçsuzdoğanlarız."
